meanings.definition: A type of elastic band used to secure items in place.
meanings.sent1: I used spacebands to hold my papers together.
meanings.sent2: The spacebands kept the box closed during the move.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten played with the spacebands, thinking they were toys.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was like a tangled web held by spacebands.
meanings.sent5: The bright red spacebands stood out against the white paper.

meanings.definition: Bands of space between objects or areas.
meanings.sent1: The spacebands between the trees allowed sunlight to filter through.
meanings.sent2: There were spacebands of clear sky between the clouds.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the spacebands on the floor were lava to avoid stepping on them.
meanings.sent4: The silence filled the spacebands between their words.
meanings.sent5: The spacebands of grass separated the garden from the path.

meanings.definition: A musical group specializing in space-themed music.
meanings.sent1: The spacebands performed a concert under the stars.
meanings.sent2: Fans of space music were excited to see the spacebands live.
meanings.sent3: The spacebands' tour bus was decorated like a spaceship.
meanings.sent4: Their music took the audience on a journey through the spacebands of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The spacebands' lyrics painted vivid pictures of distant galaxies.
